issue.title: www.miruro.tv
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.miruro.tv/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.miruro.tv%2F) ### Comment > fr  ca: AdGuard Français filter list breaks miruro.tv > > The whole website turns black when this filter list is enabled since uBlock Origin version 1.63.2 > > Tested on Firefox with no other extensions. Turned off all filter lists in uBO and turned them back on one by one until I found which one breaks the website. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lm3hdall0c0scgsscogso4g44gg0co8hvrfmi0u1gg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kqijfr57tmo4880k8cs0wkwscos844cml4ni1z6hyo.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin (Firefox) System version: | Windows 11, version 23H2 Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Language-specific:
AdGuard French

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.miruro.tv/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.miruro.tv%2F) ### Comment > According to this discussion on https://www.reddit.com/r/uBlockOrigin/comments/1ji7r4o/mirurotv_displays_a_totally_black_page/, when the update of this French AdGuard filter is enabled, this website https://www.miruro.tv/ displays a totally black page... issue.title: devuploads.com

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

What product do you use?
AdGuard for Android

AdGuard version
4.9.13

What type of problem have you encountered?
AdGuard gets detected on a website, Website or app doesn't work properly

Which browser(s) do you use?
other (specify in comment below)

Which device do you use?
Mobile

Where is the problem encountered?
https://devuploads.com/8dbqsg2wcglh

Ad Blocking
AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

Privacy
AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

Social Widgets
AdGuard Social Media filter

Annoyances
AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances

Security
No response

Other
No response

DNS filters
AdGuard DNS filter

Language-specific
No response

What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?
Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block third-party Authorization header, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Protect from DPI, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests
